document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">bird </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">came </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">down </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">walk; </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">did </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">know </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">saw; </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">bit </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">angleworm </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">halves </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">ate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">fellow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">raw. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">then </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">he </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">drank </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">dew </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">From </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">convenient </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">grass, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">then </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">hopped </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">sidewise </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff04c4">wall, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">let </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">beetle </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">pass. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">glanced </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">rapid </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">eyes </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff04c4">hurried </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">around; </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">They </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44b0d4">looked </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">frightened </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">beads, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">thought; </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">stirred </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">velvet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff04c4">head </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">danger, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff04c4">cautious. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">offered </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">him </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">crumb, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">he </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">unrolled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">feathers </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff04c4">rowed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">him </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff04c4">softer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">home </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Than </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">oars </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">divide </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">ocean, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Too </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">silver </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff04c4">seam </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">butterflies, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">off </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">banks </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">noon, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Leap, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">plashless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">swim. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: A bird came down the walk
